Libraries:
	Boost
		- http://www.boost.org
		- Subset of 1.54.0 created with
		- ./bcp lexical_cast outfolder
		- Boost Software License
	curl
		- http://curl.haxx.se/libcurl/
		- MIT License
	facebook
		- https://developers.facebook.com/
		- iOS (3.6) and Android (3.0.2) SDKs unmodified
	freetype
		- http://www.freetype.org/
		- Freetype License (BSD-style license with a credit clause)
	imageresampler
		- https://code.google.com/p/imageresampler/
		- Public Domain
	jpgd
		- https://code.google.com/p/jpgd/
		- Public Domain
	JsonCpp 
		- http://jsoncpp.sourceforge.net/
		- From SVN revision 252
		- MIT License
	libzip
		- Modified version for android
		- https://github.com/julienr/libzip-android
		- BSD License
	OpenALSoft
		- Modified version for android (build on OpenSL)
		- https://github.com/AerialX/openal-soft-android
		- LGPL
	openssl
		- http://www.openssl.org/
		- OpenSSL License (Apache style with acknowledgment)
	pugixml
		- http://pugixml.org/
		- Version 1.2
		- MIT License
	spine-c
		- http://github.com/EsotericSoftware/spine-runtimes
		- From github on April 8, 2013
		- Spine License - requires attribution
	stb_image
		- http://www.nothings.org/stb_image.c
		- Public Domain
	stb_vorbis
		- http://www.nothings.org/stb_vorbis
		- Version 0.99996
		- Public Domain
	Wm5
		- http://www.geometrictools.com
		- Subset of WildMagic 5.7
		- Boost Software License
